pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:1.4: “yatheva mayaṃ sapajāpatikā āhiṇḍāma, evamevime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya āhiṇḍantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:1.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:1.6: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:1.7: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:1.8: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:1.11: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:1.14: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjeyya, antamaso gāmantarampi, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:1.15: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca sāketā sāvatthiṃ addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:2.2: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo te bhikkhū etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:2.4: “Na, bhaginī, kappati bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:2.5: Tumhe vā paṭhamaṃ gacchatha mayaṃ vā gamissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:2.8: Atha kho tāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ pacchā gacchantīnaṃ antarāmagge corā acchindiṃsu ca dūsesuñca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:2.9: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:2.12: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:2.13: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, satthagamanīye magge sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:2.14: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:2.15: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjeyya, antamaso gāmantarampi, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:2.16: Tatthāyaṃ samayo. Satthagamanīyo hoti maggo sāsaṅkasammato sappaṭibhayo—ayaṃ tattha samayo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:3.1.10: “gacchāma, bhagini, gacchāmāyya; gacchāmāyya, gacchāma, bhagini; ajja vā hiyyo vā pare vā gacchāmā”ti saṃvidahati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:3.1.12: kukkuṭasampāte gāme, gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:3.1.13: Agāmake araññe, addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:3.1.17: maggo na sakkā hoti vinā satthena gantuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:3.1.19: tasmiṃ magge corānaṃ niviṭṭhokāso dissati, bhuttokāso dissati, ṭhitokāso dissati, nisinnokāso dissati, nipannokāso dissati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:3.1.21: tasmiṃ magge corehi manussā hatā dissanti, viluttā dissanti, ākoṭitā dissanti, sappaṭibhayaṃ gantvā appaṭibhayaṃ dassetvā uyyojetabbā— “gacchatha, bhaginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:3.2.1: Saṃvidahite saṃvidahitasaññī ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjati, antamaso gāmantarampi, aññatra samayā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:3.2.2: Saṃvidahite vematiko ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjati, antamaso gāmantarampi, aññatra samayā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:3.2.3: Saṃvidahite, asaṃvidahitasaññī ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjati, antamaso gāmantarampi, aññatra samayā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:3.2.4: Bhikkhu saṃvidahati bhikkhunī na saṃvidahati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
